name: The work of employee 427
description:
Welcome to Aperture Technology, because you are so good, so we will assign you to work at No. 427.

Your job is very simple: look at the screen, and press the button that the system asks you to press.

You know how many people dream of this job. This job is easy and high-paying.

I hope you will be able to work within three days. If you cannot work for some reason, please contact us as soon as possible and explain the situation.

Want to convey

Maybe work, so boring, like my life.

This game is not a game. Initially, the idea about it came from my favorite game : The Stanley Parable.

In The Stanley Parable, Stanley is employee 427.

In the game, when they described Stanley's work, they said:

Stanley works for a company in a building. He is employee 427. The work of employee 427 was simple: Sitting at the desk and pressing the button on the keyboard. The display will tell him the instructions: what button to press, how long to press, in what order. This is the day-to-day, year-on-year work of employee 427, although others think this work is boring. But Stanley enjoys the timing of each command, as if he were born for this work. Stanley is happy.

I would love to know if a person's job is to press a specific key on the keyboard, How long can he persist? Will he be happy, or will he be mad, still thinking, or just looking at the screen?

Then the work of employee 427 was born!

 

At present, the game is still under development. There is a preliminary demo that you can try.

In this preliminary little demo, I tried hard to shape the process of employee No. 427's entry to work.

It took me a long time to implement it. Although this experience is very short, I think it is worth it.

Welcome to play~ Also look forward to your feedback~

Supports English language and Chinese language.

(AND: My English is very poor, so if you can't read it, please let me know. thank you very much!)
